question: Weave three strands of thin wire to make one thicker wire.
option1: Take three equal lengths of wire and fix them to a object.  Take the left most strand and wrap it around the center and right strand.  Keep wrapping that strand until it runs out.  The left strand should be twice as long as the center and right.
option2: Take three equal lengths of wire and fix them to a object. Take the left most strand and cross over the center strand.  Take the right strand and cross over the new center strand.  Take the left most strand and cross over the center strand.  Repeat until finished.

question: How do you get grease off of a stove top?
option1: Remove heating coils and grease catchers first. Mix 1 part sugar water and 1 part white vinegar in a spray bottle. Spray this over the grease and allow to sit for about 10 minutes. Scrub with a damp rag to remove burnt on grease.
option2: Remove heating coils and grease catchers first. Mix 1 part lemon juice and 1 part white vinegar in a spray bottle. Spray this over the grease and allow to sit for about 10 minutes. Scrub with a damp rag to remove burnt on grease.

question: How do I fix a toilet that runs?
option1: Flush the toilet and look for a fill valve leak. Lift up on the toilet float arm when the tank is filling to see if the water stops. Bend or adjust the toilet float arm so the tank stops filling when the water level is 1/2- to 1-in. below the bottom of the overflow pipe
